name: Two Sides One Choice
description:
Two Sides One Choice is a card game where you live throughout the five stages of life, infancy, childhood, adolescence, adulthood and old age. Your choices may influence your three stats, health, bux and mood. Let any of the stats hit zero, your life comes to an end.  There are 10+ endings, can you find them all?

Multiple play throughs recommended

Why not add some less controllable variation and let the coin decide your fate?

This Game is made for the BenBonk Game Jam 3 under the Theme, Two-Sides.

 All the art was created by the team during the Game Jam. All audio is credited within the game.

Made By:

  • Sylux https://sylux02.itch.io
  • Joi Rudin https://www.artstation.com/joirudin
  • NudalZmith https://nudalzmith.itch.io/
  • Hcay https://hcay.itch.io
